                            <h1>Not a typical heart attack</h1>

                        </figure>
                    </li>

                            <h1>Specialized attention for complicated pregnancies</h1>
                            <p>Our Maternal and Fetal Medicine team provides outstanding care to women who are at risk for abnormal pregnancy outcomes or who develop medical problems during pregnancy, including obstetrical complications and fetal abnormalities.</p>
                            <a id="home_top_0_rptItems_lnkResourceLink_2" class="mediaLink more" href="/patient-care-services/Departments-and-Services/Obstetrics-and-Gynecology/Clinical-Care-Services/Maternity-Services">Learn about our Maternity Services</a>

                        </figure>

                            <p>Looking for directions to our main campus in Boston or one of our satellite locations throughout New England?&nbsp; Whether you are a first time patient, returning patient or a family member here to visit a loved one, our campus maps can help you feel more confident upon arrival.</p>

<div class="row">
<div class="left">
<h1>Our Locations + Affiliates</h1>
<p>Together with our network of qualified physicians, affiliated academic institutions and hospitals, and dedicated community partners we continue to build upon our rich tradition of health care innovation, leadership, charity and the highest standard of care and service for all.</p>
</div>
<div class="right">

<script type="text/javascript">

    function toggleReadMoreContent(contentID, readMoreLinkID) {
        //display hidden content
        if ($('#' + contentID)) {
            $('#' + contentID).show();
        }
        //hide the readmore link
        if ($('#' + readMoreLinkID)) {
            $('#' + readMoreLinkID).hide();
        }
    }

    function redirectToPageDDL(ddl) {
        var url = ddl.options[ddl.selectedIndex].value;
        if (url) {
            window.location = url;
        }
    }

    function getURLParameter(name) {
        return decodeURIComponent((new RegExp('[?|&]' + name + '=' + '([^&;]+?)(&|#|;|$)').exec(location.search) || [, ""])[1].replace(/\+/g, '%20')) || null;
    }

    //section search and search page
    function performSiteSearch(keyword, parent_id, type)
    {
        //if keyword is blank, lets get it from the URL
        if (!(keyword && keyword.length > 0)) {
             keyword = getURLParameter('q');
        }

        //if parent_id is blank, lets get it from the URL
        if (!(parent_id && parent_id.length > 0)) {
            parent_id = getURLParameter('parent_id');
        }

        //if search type is blank, lets get it from the URL
        if (!(type && type.length > 0)) {
            type = getURLParameter('type');
            //if it's still blank, default to 'page'
            if (!(type && type.length > 0)) {
                type = 'page';
            }
        }



        window.location = '/search?q=' + escape(keyword) + '&parent_id=' + parent_id + '&type=' + type;
    }

    //global search (header)
    function performGlobalSearch(keyword, parent_id) {
        window.location = '/search?q=' + escape(keyword) + '&parent_id=' + parent_id + '&type=page';
    }

    //filter search results
    function performSearchFilterResults() {
        if (document.getElementById('searchform')) {
            try {

                //before we submit lets get all the active terms that were checked by the user
                var terms = $('#searchfilter-terms li a').map(function (i, n) {
                    return ($(n).attr('class') == 'active') ? $(n).text() : '';
                }).get().join('|');

                //add the value to the hidden field
                $('#taxonomy-search-terms').val(terms);

                //set the hidden keyword variable
                $('#search-query-post').val($('#txtSearchQueryResultspage').val());

                //submit the form
                document.getElementById('searchform').submit();
            } catch (err) { }
        }
    }

    function performClinicalTrialSearchTag(area) {
        var param_list = 'q=' + escape($('#clinical_trials_query').val());
        param_list += '&area=' + escape(area);
        param_list += '&dept=' + escape($('#clinical_trials_dept').val());
        param_list += '&gender=' + escape($('#clinical_trials_gender').val());
        param_list += '&age=' + escape($('#clinical_trials_age').val());

        window.location = '/ClinicalTrials/Search.aspx?' + param_list;
    }
